CustomField.description: Cost per Unit = Base Price * Factory Price OR Base Price * Product Cost
CustomField.formula: IF ( MinimumSalesPrice__c >0 , MinimumSalesPrice__c + (MinimumSalesPrice__c *( MultiplierCost__c -1)* (Transmission__c/100)), PriceBase__c + (Base_Price__c *( MultiplierCost__c -1)* (Transmission__c/100)))
CustomField.label: Unit Cost
